item.title: Workers
item.description: You can run multiple monstache processes and distribute the work between them. First configure the names of all the workers in a shared config.toml file. workers = ["Tom", "Dick", "Harry"] In this case we have 3 workers. Now we can start 3 monstache processes and give each one of the worker names. monstache -f config.toml -worker Tom monstache -f config.toml -worker Dick monstache -f config.toml -worker Harry monstache will hash the id of each document using consistent hashing so that each id is handled by only one of the available workers.
